entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
